results.name: Negative integers in base -4.
comment: Interleaving with zeros gives A212542 (base 2i representation of negative integers).
More precisely, a(n) is the representation of -n in base -4. - _M. F. Hasler_, May 21 2012
link: Joerg Arndt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: a:= proc(n) local d, i, l, m;
for i from 0 while m>0 do
if irem (i, 2)=0 and d>0 then d:= 4-d; m:= m+1 fi;
results.author: _Joerg Arndt_, May 20 2012
